pageContext.course_type_long_description: Level up your engineering skills with Play-Well TEKnologies and tens of thousands of LEGO® parts! Apply real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture through engineer-designed projects such as: Gear Cars, Castles, Airplanes, and Scissor Lifts. Design and build as never before, and explore your craziest ideas in a supportive environment. There are no prerequisites for this course.
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM FUNdamentals with LEGO® Materials, Summer
pageContext.action_url_comment: Full Day option. Only those that have signed up for both camps will be supervised during lunch. No Food Provided
